introduction.para: The species properties pane allows editing of the species name and free text annotations.

appearance.para: At the top, there is the one-line species name text field. Below, using most of the panels space, is the multi-line free text annotation text field.

operations.para: Both text fields can be edited to change species name or the free text annotation. A species name will be rejected if already in use by another species anywhere in the physiology.
